30.title: Dreadful
30.review: Really rubbish app and a even worts website always some sort of glitch especially when your in a a rush

31.title: Amazing, Easy, Cheap
31.review: I never take a taxi in London. The Underground goes everywhere and then you have to walk a little. Walking is how you see London. The signs down under can guide even a non-subway rider. Easy. Never that crowded and the trains come a lot more often than the ones in NYC.

32.title: Why are peoplke allowedon tubes without masks
32.review: Travelled on tubes to get around but sadly on all trips there were people without masks why were they allowed to travel

33.title: Smelly and hot
33.review: Didnt like the traveling with the tube. Very hot and difficult to breath. On one station a very strong urine smell. No personel to ask for help.

34.title: The train is king
34.review: The best way to get around London is using the underground. Study the tube map and you can find everything easy.

35.title: Well worth a visit
35.review: A very enjoyable place to visit, whether you are a tourist or a Londoner or a tourist. A lot of interesting stuff for adults, but also plenty to keep kids interested, even with Covid restrictions.

36.title: Preferred method
36.review: Always use the underground as it's the easiest and price efficient method of transport. TIP for tourists: we have and always will use 'Tube Map' app, can plan routes by saying what station you're going from and to and will tell you which lines to catch, how long it'll take and the cheapest route. Can also get notifications for any delays.

37.title: Nice experience :grinning_face:
37.review: The underground :metro: network is extensive and arguably the fastest transport. The stairs are quite long and sometimes confusing.

38.title: Fantastic
38.review: When you first look at the map your probably thinking 'oh my god what are all these coloured line!' but when you get your head around it it's brilliant because you have the different zones (depending on the pass that you buy) you can travel all over London

39.title: Confusing at forst
39.review: Handy using the underground.Got confused at first however lots of helpful staff on hand to help.Bought a day card so we could use it on all transport and it was a godsend in the end.
